title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 29.11 - Special provisions for the profession of certified shorthand reporting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 29.11 - Special provisions for the profession of certified shorthand reporting

State Regulations
(a) Unprofessional
conduct in the practice of certified shorthand reporting shall include all
conduct prohibited by section
29.1
of this Part, except as
provided in this section. The provisions of section
29.1
(b)(3)
of this

Part, except as it prohibits bribes, and section
29.1
(b)(12)(i)(d), (e) and
(g) of this Part shall not apply to the
practice of certified shorthand reporting. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
29.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
